quote: Ultimately, we believe that involving such a canonical and standardized model meta-data descriptors in design of interpretable methods for ML may lead to better insights into the data and the properties of ML algorithms.
The schema contains classes for representing different aspects of machine learning.
This includes representations data, datasets and data/dataset characteristics.

DMOP contains a taxonomy of algorithms used in DM processes which are described in detail in terms of their underlying assumptions, cost functions, optimization strategies, generated models or pattern sets, and other properties.
